room_title: Escape room "Crazy Artist’s Workshop" by Escape Zone Houston in Houston
review: Romantic room with verb artistic story. Good for small company and with kids

room_title: Escape room "Crazy Artist’s Workshop" by Escape Zone Houston in Houston
review: Fun times, great team work opportunity and a variety of puzzles at different difficulty levels.

room_title: Escape room "Crazy Artist’s Workshop" by Escape Zone Houston in Houston
review: My team had a great experience at the "Crazy Artist's Workshop". We finished with 2 minutes to spare! Learned some interesting concepts as well as a lot about my team! Great GameMaster too!

room_title: Escape room "Crazy Artist’s Workshop" by Escape Zone Houston in Houston
review: We did the Salvador Dali room. It's not as big as some of the other rooms I've done or as well-furnished, but it has quite a bit of sophisticated lock mechanisms and puzzles that require some deeper level thinking which more than makes up for the size. Definitely recommend checking this one out on your rotation of Houston escape rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Crazy Artist’s Workshop" by Escape Zone Houston in Houston
review: What a great time. If you are looking for something different to do, bring your family and friends. I am a big puzzle fan and this is like being in the puzzle. I will be back.

room_title: Escape room "Crazy Artist’s Workshop" by Escape Zone Houston in Houston
review: Excellent venue!! Came with my sister for my birthday weekend. The puzzles are cleverly devised. Nik (manger) is quite lovely and enhances the experience as your eye in the sky. If you enjoy hunts, puzzles and mysteries, you'll love it.
